title: Ticket #4587: Glue Goals Config with condor_install/ Have known requirements
description:
Test Glue Improvements

We want to move away from our own way of configuring personals toward having the condor_install script be the standard basis for configuring. We also want to remove our dependence on cygwin. In general we want to make it easier for testing to be done by our users.

Long term we want the tests to be self declaring their needs. For now we have a file called Test_Requirements. This file currently has all the files which either require a personal or cygwin. Eventually this file can be parsed and requirements can be injected into the tests.
